message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any younger. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you 45, but I think I'm getting the better end of the deal. What do you say?
You're getting less and less, Bob. Time to make a serious offer!
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve more. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my best offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm almost out of options, but I'm not giving up yet. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
